QuestData.Title: Redirect the Search
QuestData.Description:
I believe the Fatescribe was headed to the Sanctuary of Guidance. A holy place for the attendants of Korthia.
Fortunately, because you seem to be in the habit of picking up every piece of trash you find, we have the Fatescribe's Implement!
I'm sure that will prove useful in locating him. But first, on to the Sanctuary.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Caretaker Kah-Than at the entrance to the Sanctuary of Guidance in Korthia.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Caretaker Kah-Than at the entrance to the Sanctuary of Guidance in Korthia.
QuestData.RewardText:
$p! At last!
You know that I cannot do this without you.
